com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts
Class RhnHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts.RhnHelper

public class RhnHelper
extends java.lang.Object

RhnHelper contains helpful methods usable by our presentation layers.

Method Detail

pathNeedsSecurity

public static boolean pathNeedsSecurity(java.lang.String[] nosecurityPaths,
                                        java.lang.String path)
If the path doesn't require authentication, return false. Otherwise return true. Checks that the passed in path doesn't startwith the params found in nosecurityPaths

Parameters:
nosecurityPaths - array of String paths, "/foo", "/bar/baz/test.jsp", "/somepath/foo.do"
path - to check
Returns:
boolean if it needs to be authorized or not

handleEmptySelection

public static void handleEmptySelection(HttpServletRequest request)
Method to add the default empty selection error message to the request

Parameters:
request - the servlet request

getTextAreaValue

public static java.lang.String getTextAreaValue(DynaActionForm form,
                                                java.lang.String name)
Use this for every textarea that we use in our UI. Otherwise you will get ^M in your file showing up.

Parameters:
form - to fetch from
name - of value in form
Returns:
String without CR in them.

handleEmptySelection

public static void handleEmptySelection(HttpServletRequest request,
                                        java.lang.String messageKey)
Method to add the empty selection error message to the request

Parameters:
request - the servlet request
messageKey - the key associated to the empty selection error

getParameterWithSpecialCharacters

public static java.lang.String getParameterWithSpecialCharacters(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                 java.lang.String name)
If you need to a request parameter that may contain +++ or other special characters that fails to fetch properly using request.getParameter() you can use this method.

Parameters:
request - to fetch from
name - of parameter to fetch
Returns:
String value from request, null if not found.
